original: Also known as "Dunmer" in their homeland of Morrowind, dark elves are noted for their stealth and magic skills. They are naturally resistant to fire and can call upon their Ancestor's Wrath to surround themselves in fire.
string: 在故乡晨风省，他们被称作「丹莫」。暗精灵的过人之处在于他们的力量和魔法技艺。他们天生对火焰有高抵抗力，并且能召唤先祖之怒，使全身环绕着火焰。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: Natives of Cyrodiil, they have proved to be shrewd diplomats and traders. They are skilled with combat and magic. Anywhere gold coins might be found, Imperials always seem to find a few more. They can call upon the Voice of the Emperor to calm an enemy.
string: 赛瑞迪尔省的在地居民。他们是狡猾的老油条和商人。他们的作战和魔法技能卓越。一般而言无论何处都有可能找到金币，但帝国人总能找到更多。他们能使用帝王之声使敌人冷静下来。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: The clanfolk of the Western Valenwood forests, also known as "Bosmer." Wood elves make good scouts and thieves, and there are no finer archers in all of Tamriel. They have natural resistances to both poisons and diseases. They can Command Animals to fight for them.
string: 作为西威木省森林的氏族，他们也被人称作「波兹莫」。木精灵是优秀的哨兵和盗贼，并且是泰姆瑞尔最好的弓箭手。他们有对毒素和疾病的自然抵抗力，也能指挥动物为他们作战。

original: Citizens of Skyrim, they are a tall and fair-haired people.  Strong and hardy, Nords are famous for their resistance to cold and their talent as warriors. They can use a Battlecry to make opponents flee.
string: 诺德人是天际省的居民，身材高大、髮色金黄。他们犟壮、耐劳又耐寒，是着名的天生战士。只消发出一声战吼，敌人就会吓得逃窜。

original: For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <mag> points of damage per second.
string: 近身的敌人每秒受到<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: Conjures a Hollowjack Indrik for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 无论施法者指向何处，召唤一个杰克因德里克（Hollowjack Indrik）持续<持续时间>秒。

original: Absorb <mag> points of magicka from the target.
Summons a Dwarven Sphere for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之处召唤一颗矮人机械球 ，持续<dur>秒。

original: Summons the subjugated Demon Lord from the aether
string: 从以太中召唤被征服的恶魔领主

original: Banishes the subjugated Demon Lord to the aether
string: 将已被征服的恶魔领主驱逐到以太空间

original: Summons the subjugated Demon Lord from the aether
string: 从以太中召唤被征服的恶魔领主
对目标造成<mag>点伤害，持续<dur>秒。

original: Creates a magic battle axe for <dur> seconds. Sheathe it to dispel.
string: 制造一柄可以持续<dur>秒的魔法巨斧，收起即消失。

original: Summons a spriggan for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者指向的任何位置召唤一个精灵，持续<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Frost Atronach for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 在施法者所指之处召唤一个寒霜元素，持续<dur>秒。

original: Summons a Ice Wraith for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
string: 召唤冰灵，持续<dur>秒，无论施法者指向何处。

original: Absorb <mag> points of health, magicka, and stamina per second from the target.
string: 每秒吸取目标<mag>点生命力、法力与精力。

original: Absorbs <mag> health every second. Can only be equipped in the left hand.
string: 每秒吸收<mag>点生命值。只能装备在左手。

original: Absorbs <mag> health every second. Can only be equipped in the left hand.
string: 每秒吸收<mag>点生命值。只能装备在左手。

original: Absorb <mag> points of health, magicka, and stamina per second from the target.
string: 每秒吸取目标<mag>点生命力、法力与精力。

original: Absorbs <mag> Health, Magicka, and Stamina every second.
string: 每秒吸收<mag>的生命值、魔力和耐力。

original: Absorbs <mag> Health, Magicka, and Stamina every second.
string: 每秒吸收<mag>的生命值、魔力和耐力。

original: High Elves are born with <50> extra magicka.
string: 高等精灵天生得到<50>点额外魔法值。

original: Summon the subjugated Demon Lord from the Aether.
string: 从以太中召唤被征服的恶魔领主。

original: Banish the subjugated Demon Lord to the Aether.
string: 将征服的恶魔领主驱逐到以太空间。

original: Conjure a weakened imitation of the defeated Demon Lord for 2 minutes.
string: 召唤一个被击败的恶魔领主的弱化仿制品，持续2分钟。

original: Conjure subjugated Demon Guards from the Aether.
string: 从以太中召唤被征服的恶魔守卫。
将你的随从传送到你身边。
将你的随从传送到你身边。
将你的随从传送到你身边。

original: A translucent nightgown, exuding the warm scent of a young girl.
string: 一件半透明的睡衣，散发着年轻女孩的温暖气息。

original: The gauntlets worn by Alaris, enhanced with elven runes, possess a powerful bonus to destructive magic.
string: 阿拉里斯佩戴的护手，经由精灵符文强化，对毁灭性魔法具有强大的加成效果。

original: Alaris's boots still emit the warmth of a young girl.
string: 阿拉里斯的靴子仍然散发着年轻女孩的温暖气息。

original: Alaris's hair accessory possesses powerful magical enchantments.
string: 阿拉里斯的头发饰品拥有强大的魔法加持。

original: Alaris's magical wings are actually wearable items, which is very amazing.
string: 阿拉里斯的魔法翅膀实际上是可穿戴物品，这非常令人惊叹。

original: The pauldrons worn by Alaris are quite exquisite, surely the work of a master craftsman.
string: 阿拉里斯佩戴的护肩非常精致，无疑是出自一位大师级工匠之手。

original: Translucent underwear, exuding the warm body fragrance of a girl, and transparent brushed liquid on it, what is it?
string: 半透明的内衣，散发着女孩温暖的体香，上面还涂有透明的拉丝液体，这是什么？

original: Conjure Hollowjack Indrik
string: 召唤因德里克·霍洛杰克

original:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>Hello,
      
    To whomever eyes may wonder across these words, I ask you this...
Free me.
</font>
string:
<font face='$HandwrittenFont'>Hello,
      
     对于那些偶然看到这些文字的人，我想请求你们。..
释放我。
</font>

original: Teleport Liesel to the player
string: 将莉赛尔传送到玩家身边
传送艾瑞斯
传送坎迪斯

original: Summons the subjugated Demon Lord, Lucifer, from the Aether. She is weakened in her controled state, but beware. She was once the strongest being across the realms. Use at your own risk...
string: 从以太中召唤被征服的恶魔领主路西法。她在被控制的状态下实力被削弱，但请小心。她曾是整个领域中最强大的存在。使用此技能需自担风险。..

original: Banishes the subjugated Demon Lord, Lucifer, to the Aether. She is weakened in her controled state, but beware. She was once the strongest being across the realms. Use at your own risk...
string: 将已被征服的恶魔领主路西法驱逐到以太界。她在被控制的状态下实力有所削弱，但请小心。她曾是跨越所有领域的最强存在。使用此技能需自担风险。..

original: Conjures a subjugated Demon Lord from the Aether. She is weakened in her controled state, but beware. She was once the strongest being across the realms. Use at your own risk...
string: 从以太中召唤出一个被征服的恶魔领主。她在被控制的状态下实力有所削弱，但请小心。她曾是整个领域中最强大的存在。使用需自担风险。..

original: Would you mind changing into an Indrik?
string: 请问是否介意变成印度犀牛？
阿米拉会与你并肩前行。

original: Lead the way, and Amira's eyes will watch your back.
string: 带路吧，阿米拉会用双眼守护你的安全。

original: Together, like twin moons chasing the night sky.
string: 它们并肩而行，宛如双月追逐夜空。

original: Then let us wander together, hmm?
Of course... where you go, this one goes.
string: 当然……你去哪，我就跟着去。

original: Do not keep this one waiting again.
This one knew you couldn't leave her behind for long.
string: 我知道你不能把她抛下太久。

original: Finally! Amira thought you forgot her.
string: 终于！阿米拉还以为你忘了她呢。

original: Mmm, this spot is cozy enough.
This one will sharpen her claws while she waits.
string: 她会在她等待的时候磨砺她的爪子。

original: Amira will stay... like a loyal kitten.
string: 阿米拉会像只忠诚的小猫一样待着。

original: I need to trade somthing with you.
string: 我需要和你交换一些东西。

original: You trust this one with your things?
string: 你把东西托付给这个人吗？

original: Let Amira carry your burdens. She is stronger than she looks.
string: 让阿米拉替你分担重担吧。她远比她看起来要坚强。

original: Khajiit knows how to keep secrets... and shiny things.
string: 猫人知道如何保守秘密……以及保管闪亮的东西。

original: Is time for us to part ways
string: 是时候我们分道扬镳了

original: Mmm... fine. But don't forget this one, or she will scratch.
string: 嗯……好吧。但别忘了这个，不然她会抓伤你的。

original: Do not wander too far without Amira.
string: 没有阿米拉，不要走得太远。

original: This one understands' even if she doesn't like it.
string: 这个理解，即使她并不喜欢。

original: If that is what you wish, Amira will not argue...
string: 如果这是你所愿，阿米拉不会反对。..

original: Heh... such curious smells around here.
This place smells old... and dangerous.
string: 这个地方闻起来很陈旧……而且很危险。

original: I feel like exploring a new path.
string: 我想探索一条新的道路。

original: These stones... too old, too quiet.
string: 这些石头……太古老，太寂静。

original: This one does not like walls so close.
Keep your eyes open... and your claws sharper.
string: 留意...还有你的爪子更锋利了。

original: The smell of food... distant, but tempting.
string: 食物的香味……虽遥远，却诱人。

original: I wonder who walked here before us.
string: 我想知道在我们之前，是谁走到了这里。

original: There are so many things to discover here.
string: 这里有太多东西值得探索了。

original: Mmm... smell of old bones... interesting.
string: 嗯……古老尸骨的味道……挺有意思的。

original: Bones, dust... and maybe shiny things.
string: 骨头、灰尘……或许还有闪闪发光的东西。
好奇……不死生物的气息……挺有趣的，是吧？

original: Careful... one step wrong, trap snaps.
string: 小心... 一步走错，陷阱就会触发。
嗯……这个闻起来有死亡的气息。

original: This one rests... for a moment.
string: 这个就先休息一会儿吧。

original: Mmm... that is not this one's way.
string: 嗯...这可不是某人的风格。

original: You live today because Amira allows it.
string: 你之所以能活到今天，是因为阿米拉允许你活下去。

original: This one will tear you apart like paper!
string: 这个会像撕纸一样把你撕成碎片！
你现在就与阿米拉一战！

original: If your level is above 50, the magic damage increases by 50%.
string: 如果你的等级超过50级，魔法伤害将增加50%。
